一名玩家获得了向日葵.Translation: A player has obtained a Sunflower.

出生区域的传送已启动.Translation: The teleportation to the spawn area has been activated.

豌豆射手：前面就是戴夫家的菜园了，好久没见他了今天来看看.Translation: Peashooter: Up ahead is Dave's vegetable garden. I haven't seen him in a while, so I came to check it out today.

学校大门还有40秒打开.Translation: The school gate will open in 40 seconds.

等待30秒迷宫的栅栏门打开.Translation: Wait 30 seconds for the maze gate to open.

走廊被东西挡住了，从教室里绕过去吧.Translation: The corridor is blocked; go around from the classroom.

== 15 seconds until the first door opens.Translation: == 15 seconds until the first door opens ==

== 15 seconds until the second door open.Translation: == 15 seconds until the second door opens ==

== The side path opens in 10 seconds ==.Translation: == The side path opens in 10 seconds ==

向日葵：这戴夫的院子怎么这么乱.Translation: Sunflower: Why is Dave's yard so messy?

豌豆射手：之后一定要好好拷打下这戴夫，大家现在赶紧去准备下搬开前面那个横在路上的.Translation: Peashooter: We have to teach Dave a lesson later. Everyone, hurry up and prepare to move that hoe blocking the road.

需要同时在三个不同的部位搬起锄头.Translation: You need to lift the hoe from three different positions at the same time

坚果墙：戴夫家的污水我碰都不想碰，那味道闻着就恶心.Translation: Wall-nut: I don't even want to touch the sewage from Dave's house; it smells disgusting.

一名玩家获得了寒冰射手.Translation: A player has obtained Ice Shooter

已解锁所有非关卡道中出现的神器.Translation: All non-level artifacts that appear have been unlocked

一名玩家获得了火爆辣椒.Translation: A player has obtained Spicy Pepper

锄头头部已经就绪.Translation: The head of the hoe is ready

门外玩家即将传送到门内.Translation: Players outside are about to be teleported inside the door

锄头柄已经就绪.Translation: The handle of the hoe is ready

锄头尾部已经就绪.Translation: The tail of the hoe is ready

锄头将会在45秒后被抬走.Translation: The hoe will be lifted in 45 seconds

豌豆射手：锄头已经被挪开了,大家快后撤.Translation: Peashooter: The hoe has been moved! Everyone, fall back quickly!

豌豆射手：还好戴夫永远不会关菜园的栅栏门，不然又要花好多时间来破坏这个门了.Translation: Peashooter: Luckily, Dave never closes the garden gate, or it would take a lot of time to break down this door.

豌豆射手：大家快去敲戴夫的门，他只要把我们接到屋子里就安全了.Translation: Peashooter: Everyone, hurry up and knock on Dave's door; if he lets us into the house, we'll be safe.

向日葵：戴夫，开门！我是向日葵，有一堆僵尸在追我们！.Translation: Sunflower: Dave, open the door! I'm Sunflower, and a bunch of zombies are chasing us!

向日葵：开门啊！我知道你在家里！.Translation: Sunflower: Open the door! I know you're home!

豌豆射手：这戴夫怕不是睡着了，看来得另外找个路进他家了.Translation: Peashooter: I think Dave must be asleep; it looks like we have to find another way into his house.

向日葵：戴夫家的下水道是能走的，就在菜园的另一边.Translation: Sunflower: The sewer at Dave's house is passable; it's on the other side of the garden.

坚果墙：走下水道？口区.Translation: Wall-nut: Go through the sewer? Really?

豌豆射手：没办法了，僵尸追这么紧，不想变成食物的话只能走下水道了.Translation: Peashooter: There's no other choice; the zombies are on our tails. If we don't want to become food, we have to take the sewer.

通往下水道口的栅栏将在30秒后消失.Translation: The fence leading to the sewer will disappear in 30 seconds

一只僵尸找到了一扇铁栅门.Translation: A zombie has found an iron gate

通往下水道口的栅栏将在10秒后消失.Translation: The fence leading to the sewer will disappear in 10 seconds

通往下水道口的栅栏将在5秒后消失.Translation: The fence leading to the sewer will disappear in 5 seconds

通往下水道口的栅栏已经消失.Translation: The fence leading to the sewer has disappeared

豌豆射手：下水道口怎么还有栅栏的，大家赶紧把这个铁栅栏打烂！.Translation: Peashooter: Why is there still a fence at the sewer entrance? Everyone, hurry up and smash this iron fence!

僵尸现在可以从穿过栅栏了.Translation: Zombies can now pass through the fence

坚果墙：移开这个栅栏需要点时间，大家坚持一会.Translation: Wall-nut: It will take some time to remove this fence; everyone, hold on for a bit.

栅栏门将在33秒后被打开.Translation: The fence gate will open in 33 seconds

坚果墙：按下这个应该铁门就能打开了吧.Translation: Wall-nut: Pressing this should open the iron gate, right?

豌豆射手：下水道里怎么会有一个铁门？得找到电源开关才能打开这个门.Translation: Peashooter: How can there be an iron door in the sewer? We need to find the power switch to open this door.

电闸房间的铁栅门打开了.Translation: The iron gate to the power switch room has opened

豌豆射手：坚果墙你在搞什么幺蛾子，这铁门的声音不对劲啊.Translation: Peashooter: Wall-nut, what are you up to? The sound of this iron door is off.

坚果墙：我超，我不小心把电压调太高了.Translation: Wall-nut: Oh no, I accidentally set the voltage too high.

豌豆射手：大家离这个铁门远点！我感觉这门马上要爆了！.Translation: Peashooter: Everyone, stay away from this iron door! I feel like it's about to explode!

豌豆射手:这下水道门怎么被水泥堵住了，大家把这个水泥墙打烂！.Translation: Peashooter: Why is this sewer door blocked with cement? Everyone, smash this cement wall!

水泥墙被打烂了.Translation: The cement wall has been smashed

向日葵:前面就是下水道出口了，快去敲戴夫家的门！.Translation: Sunflower: Up ahead is the sewer exit; hurry and knock on Dave's door!

向日葵：这里离戴夫的卧室很近，大家敲门吵醒他.Translation: Sunflower: We're very close to Dave's bedroom; everyone knock on the door to wake him up.

疯狂戴夫：歪比巴卜(大早上的你叫啥啊).Translation: Crazy Dave: Yippee! What do you want early in the morning?

坚持到戴夫前来开门.Translation: Hold on until Dave comes to open the door

戴夫：歪比巴卜(我马上来开门).Translation: Dave: Yippee! I'll be right there to open the door.

检测到存活人类，开始核爆.Translation: Human presence detected, initiating nuclear explosion

一名玩家获得了土豆雷.Translation: A player has obtained Potato Mine

向日葵：几天没见这戴夫把他草坪整了这么多树篱.Translation: Sunflower: I haven't seen Dave for days, and now he has so many hedges in his lawn.

豌豆射手：最气的是他的快递还要我们来拿.Translation: Peashooter: The most frustrating part is that we have to pick up his package.

需要一名玩家携带戴夫的快递，这将是通关的必要条件.Translation: A player must carry Dave's package; this is a necessary condition to clear the level

一只僵尸策反了一个豌豆射手.Translation: A zombie has corrupted a Peashooter

大门将在30秒后打开.Translation: The gate will open in 30 seconds

豌豆射手：就不知道这戴夫为什么要把这个草坪修的跟迷宫一样.Translation: Peashooter: I wonder why Dave has made this lawn like a maze.

豌豆射手：等会回去了我一定要跳起来给他两豌豆.Translation: Peashooter: When I go back, I will definitely jump and throw two peas at him.

30秒后木箱消失.Translation: The wooden box will disappear in 30 seconds

土豆雷：受不了辣，修成迷宫就算了，路上还丢一堆垃圾.Translation: Potato Mine: I can't stand the heat; making this a maze is one thing, but leaving a pile of garbage on the way is too much!

土豆雷：想爆了!.Translation: Potato Mine: I feel like exploding!

向日葵：别急，等会回去再找戴夫说嘛.Translation: Sunflower: Don't rush; we'll talk to Dave when we go back.

35秒后大门打开.Translation: The gate will open in 35 seconds

一只僵尸找到了一个惊喜盒子.Translation: A zombie found a surprise box

40秒后木板消失.Translation: The wooden board will disappear in 40 seconds

20秒后大门打开.Translation: The gate will open in 20 seconds

豌豆射手：每次到这我都会想起后院的睡莲兄.Translation: Peashooter: Every time I come here, I think of my brother the Water Lily in the backyard.

向日葵：那等会休息一下去后院看下他吧.Translation: Sunflower: Let's take a break later and check on him in the backyard.

30秒后大门打开.Translation: The gate will open in 30 seconds

坚果墙：寒冰菇老哥？怎么在这个地方待着.Translation: Wall-nut: Ice Mushroom? What are you doing here?

寒冰菇：等了好久了终于有人能来接我了，这草坪上就这个冰箱凉快点，差点就要化了.Translation: Ice Mushroom: I've been waiting for a long time for someone to come pick me up. This lawn is just too hot; I was almost melting!

需要两扇门均有人在才能打开.Translation: Both doors need to have players present to open

一名玩家获得了寒冰菇.Translation: A player has obtained Ice Mushroom

两扇门将在30秒后同时打开.Translation: Both doors will open simultaneously in 30 seconds

坚果墙：不得不说这个凉亭修的还是很不错的，要是没事的话我就到这来睡午觉.Translation: Wall-nut: I have to say, this gazebo is quite well built. If I had nothing to do, I would come here for a nap.

大门将在65秒后打开.Translation: The gate will open in 65 seconds

豌豆射手：终于要到了，等会得去敲门让戴夫开门.Translation: Peashooter: We're finally getting there; I need to knock on the door and let Dave in.

土豆雷：……我已经快忍不住了，快走吧.Translation: Potato Mine: ...I can barely hold on; let's go quickly.

最终的栅栏门将在50秒后打开.Translation: The final fence gate will open in 50 seconds

向日葵：戴夫！你的快递到了，快开门！.Translation: Sunflower: Dave! Your package has arrived; open the door quickly!

疯狂戴夫：拿到了嘛？让我看看呢.Translation: Crazy Dave: Did you get it? Let me see!

疯狂戴夫：umm，确实是这个包裹.Translation: Crazy Dave: Umm, this is indeed the package.

疯狂戴夫：马上我来给你开门.Translation: Crazy Dave: I'll open the door for you right away.

检测到人类存活，启用核爆.Translation: Human presence detected, initiating nuclear explosion

豌豆射手：这戴夫什么时候把后院的草坪全铲掉了.Translation: Peashooter: When did Dave remove all the grass from the backyard?

寒冰菇：一整片全是池塘，都不知道往哪走了.Translation: Ice Mushroom: It's all ponds here; I don't know where to go.

坚果墙：右边好像就是入口，那有个牌子不知道上面写的啥.Translation: Wall-nut: It seems the entrance is on the right; there's a sign there, but I don't know what it says.

警告：植物不能直接种在水里.Translation: Warning: Plants cannot be directly planted in water

豌豆射手：大家都看清楚警告了吧，我要按按钮咯.Translation: Peashooter: Everyone see the warning clearly? I'm about to press the button.

通往池塘的道路将在20秒后出现.Translation: The path to the pond will appear in 20 seconds

通往第二个岛的桥将在20秒后开放.Translation: The bridge to the second island will open in 20 seconds

左路木桥将在20秒后开放.Translation: The left wooden bridge will open in 20 seconds

右路木桥将在34秒后开放.Translation: The right wooden bridge will open in 34 seconds

左路木桥已开放.Translation: The left wooden bridge is now open

右路木桥已开放.Translation: The right wooden bridge is now open

土豆雷：那是睡莲兄吗？他怎么在这个地方.Translation: Potato Mine: Is that Brother Water Lily? What is he doing here?

豌豆射手：睡莲兄怎么在这个地方玩啊.Translation: Peashooter: What is Brother Water Lily doing here?

一名玩家获得了睡莲.Translation: A player has obtained Water Lily

睡莲：毁灭菇昨天跑来借我电视看，到现在都不还我，伤心了.Translation: Water Lily: The Doom Mushroom borrowed my TV to watch yesterday and hasn't returned it yet; I'm sad.

寒冰菇：这毁灭菇还是老样子啊，去看下他在干嘛？.Translation: Ice Mushroom: That Doom Mushroom is still the same; let's go see what he's up to.

睡莲：他在中间的岛上，那边只能走那个跳水台过去.Translation: Water Lily: He's on the middle island; we can only cross using that diving board.

木桥将在50秒后开放.Translation: The wooden bridge will open in 50 seconds

通往岸上的木桥将在40秒后开放.Translation: The wooden bridge to the shore will open in 40 seconds

木桥已经开放.Translation: The wooden bridge is now open

豌豆射手：那边应该就是跳水台了，从跳水台跳到中间的岛上吧.Translation: Peashooter: That should be the diving board; let's jump to the middle island from there.

坚果墙：这跳水台声音不太对啊，怎么跟要垮了一样.Translation: Wall-nut: The diving board doesn't sound right; it sounds like it's about to collapse.

豌豆射手：完了！忘了坚果墙你特别重了，再这样下去这木板要坏掉的.Translation: Peashooter: Oh no! I forgot Wall-nut, you're especially heavy; if this keeps up, the board will break!

豌豆射手：大家赶紧往下面跳，注意别掉水里了！.Translation: Peashooter: Everyone, jump down quickly, and be careful not to fall into the water!

睡莲：毁灭菇就在前面.Translation: Water Lily: The Doom Mushroom is right ahead.

一层跳水台已开放.Translation: The first level of the diving board is now open

豌豆射手：走，去看下他到底在看什么东西这么起劲.Translation: Peashooter: Let's go see what he's so excited about.

上层跳水台的木板烂掉了.Translation: The board of the upper diving platform has rotted

豌豆射手：电视看啥看那么久呢，该还给睡莲了吧.Translation: Peashooter: What are you watching on the TV for so long? You should return it to Water Lily.

寒冰菇：他怕不是看上瘾了，把他电视的电闸关了得了.Translation: Ice Mushroom: He must be addicted to watching; just turn off the power to his TV.

通往电闸的路已开启.Translation: The path to the power switch is now open

坚果墙：按下这个就可以把他电视的电断了.Translation: Wall-nut: Press this to cut off the power to his TV.

毁灭菇：NO!我的电视！我的抛瓦！.Translation: Doom Mushroom: NO! My TV! My tiles!

豌豆射手：别占着电视了，睡莲兄想看了.Translation: Peashooter: Don't hog the TV; Brother Water Lily wants to watch it.

坚果墙：我超，没人跟我说这个电闸会把天线炸掉啊！.Translation: Wall-nut: Oh no, no one told me that this power switch would blow up the antenna!

疯狂戴夫：你们在搞什么飞机！我屋顶怎么爆了！.Translation: Crazy Dave: What are you doing? Why did my roof explode!

传送电箱处人类回到主岛.Translation: Humans are being teleported back to the main island

豌豆射手：这下都没电视看了，一起去修天线吧.Translation: Peashooter: Now we have no TV to watch; let's go fix the antenna.

睡莲：走这边，那边上岸快.Translation: Water Lily: This way, it's quicker to get ashore.

土豆雷：大家快走了！.Translation: Potato Mine: Everyone, hurry up and go!

30秒后出现石桥.Translation: The stone bridge will appear in 30 seconds

石桥从水中升起.Translation: The stone bridge rises from the water

豌豆射手：唉，这下戴夫要把我们骂惨了.Translation: Peashooter: Sigh, Dave is going to scold us badly now.

向日葵：等会回去了和他解释下，立马去屋顶修雷达吧.Translation: Sunflower: When we go back, we'll explain to him, then head to the roof to fix the radar.

40秒后石路从水里升起.Translation: The stone path will rise from the water in 40 seconds

石路从水里升起了.Translation: The stone path has risen from the water

豌豆射手：睡莲！这地方这么远怎么过得去啊！.Translation: Peashooter: Water Lily! How can we get across such a wide space!

睡莲：别急，这不就到我出马了吗.Translation: Water Lily: Don't worry, it's my turn to step in.

使用睡莲，在水里搭出一条路.Translation: Use Water Lily to create a path in the water

睡莲仅能使用4次.Translation: Water Lily can only be used 4 times

豌豆射手：厉害啊睡莲兄，大家抓紧上岸！.Translation: Peashooter: Awesome job, Brother Water Lily! Everyone, hurry up and get ashore!

左路第二木桥将在25秒后开放.Translation: The second wooden bridge on the left will open in 25 seconds

左路第二木桥已开放.Translation: The second wooden bridge on the left is now open

抵达烟囱顶部.Translation: Arrived at the top of the chimney

20秒后电梯启动.Translation: The elevator will start in 20 seconds

梯子50秒后开放.Translation: The ladder will open in 50 seconds

最终的电梯将在60秒后启动.Translation: The final elevator will start in 60 seconds

豌豆射手：这屋顶怎么搞了那么多违章建筑.Translation: Peashooter: Why are there so many illegal structures on this roof?

向日葵：别管那么多了，我们是来修天线的.Translation: Sunflower: Don't worry about that; we're here to fix the antenna.

向日葵：虽然不知道要往哪走，不过往天线方向走肯定没问题的.Translation: Sunflower: I don't know where to go, but heading towards the antenna should be fine.

需要左右路同时存在玩家.Translation: Players need to be present on both left and right paths to open the door

铁丝网将在30秒后消失.Translation: The barbed wire will disappear in 30 seconds

豌豆射手：这门怎么还要钥匙的.Translation: Peashooter: Why does this door still need a key?

向日葵：对面的屋子里好像有人，过去问下他呢.Translation: Sunflower: It seems there's someone in the house across; let's go ask him.

豌豆射手：行！带伙们，给这两个铁栅门拆了！.Translation: Peashooter: Alright! Everyone, let's tear down these two iron gates!

现在可以拆掉铁栅门了.Translation: You can now tear down the iron gates

西瓜投手：谁这么吵啊！我在睡午觉呢！.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: Who's making all that noise? I'm trying to take a nap!

一名玩家获得了西瓜投手.Translation: A player has obtained Watermelon Shooter

西瓜投手：啊？谁把我门拆了！.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: Huh? Who tore down my door!

豌豆射手：西瓜兄怎么在这睡午觉，我们现在要去修下天线，能帮我们开下门嘛.Translation: Peashooter: Why are you napping here, Watermelon Brother? We need to fix the antenna; can you help us open the door?

西瓜投手：开门是没问题，但是你们等会要给我把门修好.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: Opening the door is no problem, but you need to fix it for me later.

西瓜投手：来吧，我来给你们开门.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: Alright, I'll open the door for you.

15秒后开门.Translation: The door will open in 15 seconds

门被西瓜投手打开了.Translation: The door has been opened by Watermelon Shooter

西瓜投手：这地方是屋顶的建筑材料仓库，右边那个门的钥匙放在我办公室里的.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: This place is a storage room for building materials on the roof, and the key to the door on the right is in my office.

西瓜投手：就在左边走到头，三叶草应该知道位置.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: Just go to the end on the left; Clover should know the location.

坚果墙：话说这些东西是戴夫让你们建的吗.Translation: Wall-nut: By the way, did Dave ask you to build these?

西瓜投手：那当然咯，我也不知道他咋想的，他就说在他屋顶盖几栋房子.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: Of course! I don't know what he was thinking; he just said to build a few houses on his roof.

三叶草：等下，我来开门.Translation: Clover: Wait, I'll open the door.

土豆雷：纯纯违章建筑来的…….Translation: Potato Mine: This is purely illegal construction...

找到了铁栅门的钥匙.Translation: Found the key to the iron gate

铁栅门10秒后打开.Translation: The iron gate will open in 10 seconds

西瓜投手：前面还有个一样的门，也用这个钥匙就能开.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: There's another door like this ahead; it can also be opened with this key.

第二个铁栅门将在20秒后打开.Translation: The second iron gate will open in 20 seconds

第二个铁栅门打开了.Translation: The second iron gate has opened

西瓜投手：我们刚封了前面的路，只能从塔吊上面跳到屋顶上走过去了.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: We just sealed off the front road; we can only jump from the crane to get to the roof.

向日葵：别怕，摔不死的，走吧.Translation: Sunflower: Don't be afraid; you won't fall to your death. Let's go.

30秒后塔吊梯子开放.Translation: The crane ladder will open in 30 seconds

塔吊梯子已开放.Translation: The crane ladder is now open

豌豆射手：大家注意别掉下去了！.Translation: Peashooter: Everyone, be careful not to fall!

大嘴花：头好晕……感觉要掉下去了.Translation: Chomper: My head is spinning... I feel like I'm going to fall.

侧路的铁栅门消失了.Translation: The side iron gate has disappeared

西瓜投手：看到前面那个大门了吗，我们得从那两个屋子里进去.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: Do you see that big door ahead? We have to go through those two houses.

西瓜投手：天线的控制室需要从第二个房子的四楼过去.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: The antenna control room is on the fourth floor of the second house.

铁栅门将在60秒后打开.Translation: The iron gate will open in 60 seconds

需要一楼与三楼均有玩家才能开门.Translation: Players must be present on both the first and third floors to open the door

一楼的门将在30秒后打开；三楼的窗户将在35秒后打开.Translation: The first floor door will open in 30 seconds; the third floor window will open in 35 seconds

一楼的门打开了.Translation: The first floor door has opened

三楼的窗户打开了.Translation: The third floor window has opened

10秒后四楼的窗户破碎.Translation: The fourth floor window will break in 10 seconds

二楼的窗户被破坏了.Translation: The second floor window has been destroyed

四楼的窗户破碎了.Translation: The fourth floor window has shattered

第二个房子的一楼大门将在20秒后打开.Translation: The first floor door of the second house will open in 20 seconds

第二个房子的二楼玻璃将在20秒后碎掉.Translation: The second floor glass of the second house will shatter in 20 seconds

第二个房子的一楼大门打开了.Translation: The first floor door of the second house has opened

第二个房子的二楼玻璃碎了.Translation: The second floor glass of the second house has shattered

四楼的玻璃将在30秒后碎掉.Translation: The fourth floor glass will shatter in 30 seconds

现在可以从一楼的梯子上到二楼了.Translation: You can now go from the first floor to the second floor using the ladder

四楼的玻璃碎掉了.Translation: The fourth floor glass has shattered

西瓜投手：前面就是天线控制室了，大家多坚持会.Translation: Watermelon Shooter: The antenna control room is right ahead; everyone hold on a bit longer.

天线控制室的门将在40秒后打开.Translation: The door to the antenna control room will open in 40 seconds

现在可以从二楼的楼梯上到四楼了.Translation: You can now go from the second floor to the fourth floor using the stairs

天线控制室的门打开了.Translation: The door to the antenna control room has opened

三叶草：二楼就是天线的控制室，我记得里面有个自动修复的按钮.Translation: Clover: The second floor is the antenna control room; I remember there’s an auto-repair button inside.

三叶草：大家等我会，我找下自动修复的按钮.Translation: Clover: Everyone wait for me; I'll look for the auto-repair button.

三叶草：ok，这下应该天线就没事了.Translation: Clover: Ok, this should fix the antenna.

天线已修复完成.Translation: The antenna has been successfully repaired

三叶草：这边有个移动平台可以直接到烟囱口的，按边上那个按钮就行.Translation: Clover: There’s a moving platform here that goes directly to the chimney; just press that button on the side.

按下墙上的红色按钮以打开移动平台的门.Translation: Press the red button on the wall to open the moving platform's door

5秒后移动平台大门打开.Translation: The moving platform door will open in 5 seconds

20秒后移动平台启动.Translation: The moving platform will start in 20 seconds

毁灭菇将在20秒后解锁.Translation: Doom Mushroom will be unlocked in 20 seconds

一名玩家获得了毁灭菇.Translation: A player has obtained Doom Mushroom

毁灭菇准备爆炸.Translation: Doom Mushroom is getting ready to explode

烟囱的铁丝网被拆掉了.Translation: The barbed wire at the chimney has been removed

关卡已设置为：菜园.Translation: Level has been set to: Vegetable Garden

坚果墙：听说这个电箱很不稳定，最好还是不要碰的好.Translation: Wall-nut: I heard this power box is very unstable; it's best not to touch it.

电箱被玩坏了,将在15秒后爆炸.Translation: The power box has been broken; it will explode in 15 seconds

电箱即将爆炸.Translation: The power box is about to explode

一个木栅栏被僵尸拆掉了.Translation: A wooden fence has been knocked down by a zombie

有人打碎了铁板桥.Translation: Someone has smashed the iron plank bridge

已经没有剩余的睡莲了.Translation: There are no remaining Water Lilies

豌豆射手：怎么还有门啊，这都第几个了.Translation: Peashooter: Why are there still doors? How many is this already?

豌豆射手：嗯？这门好像没法用前面几个门的方法来打开.Translation: Peashooter: Huh? This door seems like it can't be opened the way the previous ones were.

该门需要按下凉亭中的按钮才能打开.Translation: This door requires pressing the button in the gazebo to open

通往第二个岛的桥将在35秒后开放.Translation: The bridge to the second island will open in 35 seconds

左路第二木桥将在15秒后开放.Translation: The second wooden bridge on the left will open in 15 seconds

第二个铁栅门将在30秒后打开.Translation: The second iron gate will open in 30 seconds

一名玩家获得了玉米投手.Translation: A player has obtained Corn Shooter

三叶草：这边有个轨道可以直接到烟囱口的，按边上那个按钮就行.Translation: Clover: There's a track here that goes directly to the chimney; just press that button on the side.

按下墙上的红色按钮以打开出口轨道的门.Translation: Press the red button on the wall to open the exit track door

20秒后出口轨道门打开.Translation: The exit track door will open in 20 seconds

豌豆射手：大晚上的什么动静啊，搞装修？.Translation: Peashooter: What's that noise at night? Are they renovating?

？？？：可恶的植物们听好了，我来给我的电视弟弟报仇来了！.Translation: ??? : Listen up, you damn plants! I'm here to take revenge for my little TV brother!

？？？：识相的话就乖乖出来挨打，不然我就把这个房子全拆了！.Translation: ??? : If you know what's good for you, come out and take your beating; otherwise, I'll tear down this whole house!

豌豆射手：那你得有这个本事，谁打谁还不一定呢！.Translation: Peashooter: Well, you'd better be able to do that; who knows who will win!

？？？：呵呵，那就让我来让你们知道什么是高科技！.Translation: ??? : Hehe, let me show you what high technology is!

愤怒电视：我是白天被你们炸掉的小电视的哥哥，我现在很生气！.Translation: Angry TV: I'm the older brother of the little TV you blew up during the day, and I'm very angry now!

愤怒电视：一分钟之内来屋顶，否则没有你们好果汁吃！.Translation: Angry TV: Come to the rooftop in one minute, or you won't have a good time!

本关仅有击败僵王才可通关.Translation: You can only clear this level by defeating the Zombie King

人类不会被僵尸感染，僵尸最大生命值大幅削减.Translation: Humans will not be infected by zombies, and zombies' maximum health has been significantly reduced

当僵尸触碰到办公区的红线，人类将会失败.Translation: If a zombie touches the red line in the office area, humans will fail

僵尸现在可以传送至平台.Translation: Zombies can now teleport to the platform

僵尸进入了屋顶办公区，人类失败.Translation: A zombie entered the rooftop office area; humans have failed

愤怒电视：noooo！我的僵王机甲！.Translation: Angry TV: Noooo! My Zombie King mech!

豌豆射手：这下懂什么是抛瓦了吧，再回去修炼几年吧！.Translation: Peashooter: Now you understand what it means to be blown up; go back and train for a few more years!

愤怒电视：可恶，你们等着，我会回来的！.Translation: Angry TV: Damn it, wait! I'll be back!

有人不慎从屋顶上掉了下去.Translation: Someone accidentally fell from the roof

一个人类获得了大喷菇.Translation: A human has obtained Big Chomper

大喷菇前来支援了.Translation: Big Chomper has come to assist

第二个房子的一楼大门将在15秒后打开.Translation: The first floor door of the second house will open in 15 seconds

关卡已设置为：屋顶(夜晚).Translation: Level has been set to: Rooftop (Night)

关卡已设置为：泳池.Translation: Level has been set to: Pool

左路第二木桥将在5秒后开放.Translation: The second wooden bridge on the left will open in 5 seconds

跳水台的楼梯将在5s后开放.Translation: The diving board stairs will open in 5 seconds

跳水台的楼梯已开放.Translation: The diving board stairs are now open

关卡已设置为：草坪.Translation: Level has been set to: Lawn

关卡已设置为：屋顶.Translation: Level has been set to: Rooftop

关卡已设置为：烟囱.Translation: Level has been set to: Chimney
